com.knowledgebin.kb

Class KBRequestWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.ServletRequestWrapper
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
        • com.knowledgebin.kb.KBRequestWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.ServletRequest

    public class KBRequestWrapper
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
    A KnowledgeBin specific wrapper for HttpServletRequest to extend parameter processing. Parameters added programmatically override the original parameter values. Two KnowledgeBin special parameters : 'kbep', and 'kbup' are expanded as query strings and override the original parameter values. 'kbep' is Base64 encoded query string. 'kbup' is an unecoded query string. Utility methods are provide for building the encoded query string.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KBRequestWrapper

        public KBRequestWrapper(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Constructs a KBRequestWrapper. A kbep parameter is treated as a Base64 encoded query string, decoded, parsed and made available to the getParameter() functions A kbup parameter is treated as a un-encoded query string, parsed and made available to the getParameter() functions. All parsed values override the original parameter values.
        Parameters:
        request - a KBRequestWrapper
